title: Store unavailable. :(
body: I can't seem to go to the store to test out skins or champions. When I hover over "Store" it just says "Not available yet" why? Thanks for the help! really appreciate it

replies.body:
Client alpha- aka a work in progress
theyre still implementing features as we go
Oh okay cause I really want to test out the new project skins ^-^ I just got accepted to pbe like 2 hours ago so im kinda new to this haha thx
Unfortunately you still have to use the legacy client to buy new champs and skins. The store for the client update is currently being worked on.
